Episodes.Title: Nothing Important Happened Today (1)
Episodes.Plot: Agent Doggett investigates the death of an EPA official after his car is forced off a bridge by a woman he picked up. He asks for assistance on the case from Scully, who has returned to her teaching position at the FBI Academy in Quantico.
Episodes.GuestStars: Lucy Lawless, Nicholas Walker, John Casino, Jane Yamamoto, Ashley Knutson, Rikki Held, Rowdy Held

Episodes.Title: Nothing Important Happened Today II (2)
Episodes.Plot: Doggett catches up with Shannon McMahon, the woman who the EPA official picked up. She claims to be a super solider and that the people she has killed were poisoning the water supply, and she wants Doggett to expose the truth.
Episodes.GuestStars: Lucy Lawless, Adam Baldwin, Ryan Cutrona, Ben Reed, Victoria Gallegos, Kevin E. West, Wyatt Smith, Jeff Austin

Episodes.Title: Dæmonicus
Episodes.Plot: Doggett and Reyes investigate the murder of a couple in West Virginia that has all the signs of a satanic ritual killing. They link the murder to a doctor who is incarcerated in a mental institute, and Doggett becomes convinced that the doctor is orchestrating the crimes from within the hospital.
Episodes.GuestStars: James Remar, Andi Chapman, Tim Halligan, Sarah Benoit, Lou Richards, Robert Beckwith, Rueben Grundy, Shane Nickerson

Episodes.Title: 4-D
Episodes.Plot: During a stakeout of murderer Irwin Lukesh, Doggett sees Reyes attacked by Lukesh, but then we see Reyes and Doggett in her apartment, apparently both fine. Elsewhere at the same time, Doggett is shot and Lukesh identifies Reyes as the shooter. While Reyes is asked for her badge and gun by A.D. Follmer, and Doggett lies in hospital near death, the conflicting circumstances of the stakeout and Doggett's shooting do not add up and it becomes clear that Lukesh possesses the power to switch between
Episodes.GuestStars: Dylan Haggerty, Angela Paton, Gil Colon, Ming Lo

Episodes.Title: Lord of the Flies
Episodes.Plot: When a stunt on a local cable reality show goes horribly wrong resulting in a man's death, Doggett and Reyes investigate. But when flies pour out of the victims eye sockets, they find themselves relying on Scully's expertise and ask her to join the investigation.
Episodes.GuestStars: Hank Harris, Samaire Armstrong, Michael Wiseman, Jane Lynch, Aaron Paul, Branden Williams, Erick Avari, Aeryk Egan

Episodes.Title: Trust No 1
Episodes.Plot: Scully is approached by a couple who claim their baby has the same abilities as William and have information about the super soldier program; however, they will only talk to Mulder, believing him the only person who can make the connections and uncover the truth. Scully is forced into an awkward situation when she has to decide whether to put Mulder's life in more danger even though she desperately wants to see him.
Episodes.GuestStars: Terry O'Quinn, Steven Flynn, Allison Smith, Kathryn Joosten, Brianne Prather, Fitz Houston

Episodes.Title: John Doe
Episodes.Plot: Scully and Reyes join forces to try and find Doggett when he goes missing. Doggett has his own problems, having woken up in jail in Mexico suffering from amnesia. With no knowledge of who he is, Doggett is befriended by a local who soon has him working smuggling illegal immigrants across the border.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jacob Handy, Zachary Handy, Charlie Hartstock, Bo Kane, René Rivera, Luis Robledo, Lucy Rodriguez, Frank Roman, Ramon Franco, Alfred De Contreras, Barbara Patrick, Zitto Kazann, Eduardo Antonio Garcia, F.J. Rio

Episodes.Title: Hellbound
Episodes.Plot: Agent Reyes takes the lead while investigating an X-file case, surrounding a man found skinned alive after having visions of seeing other people appearing skinned alive. Reyes calls on Scully's expertise to help on the investigation, which pays off when Scully finds a link to a case from 1960.
Episodes.GuestStars: Don Swayze, James McDonnell, Cyril O'Reilly, Katy Boyer, George D. Wallace, Kari Whitman, David Figlioli, Robert Beckwith, James Riker, Travis Riker

Episodes.Title: Provenance (1)
Episodes.Plot: When pieces of the spaceship beached in Africa resurface, the conspiracy within the FBI attempts to hide the information from the X-Files, especially the one person for whom the pieces have a special significance - Scully.   When Doggett and Reyes discover that Scully and her child have been put in great danger, they race to protect her and William from the evil forces pursuing him, and Scully is forced to take drastic measures to protect her child.
Episodes.GuestStars: Cary Elwes, Joe Colligan, Brian Catalano, Randy Hall, Laura Leigh Hughes, Neal McDonough, Denis Forest, McNally Sagal, James Parks, Alan Dale

Episodes.Title: Providence (2)
Episodes.Plot: Scully is anxious to recover William from his kidnappers and takes matters into her own hands when the FBI's attempts to assist in the investigation are less than helpful. With the help of the Lone Gunmen, Scully discovers terrifying information about her child's captors, and is once again forced to confront the mystery regarding the sinister interest in her son.
Episodes.GuestStars: Cary Elwes, Neal McDonough, Jamie McShane, Brian Morri, Christian Hastings, Brad Kalas, Kevin McCorkle, McNally Sagal, Denis Forest, Alan Dale, Kerrie Keane

Episodes.Title: Audrey Pauley
Episodes.Plot: After a car accident, Reyes finds herself in a very gray area, while Doggett desperately denies doctors' diagnoses about his partner, who witnesses a strange disappearance.
Episodes.GuestStars: Stan Shaw, Tracey Ellis, Jack Blessing, Del Zamora, Michele Harrell, Esther Tita Mercado, Cynthena Sanders, Joe Nieves, Ana Maria Lagasca, Vernee Watson-Johnson

Episodes.Title: Underneath
Episodes.Plot: Scully, Doggett and Reyes investigate an old case that Doggett worked on as a cop in Brooklyn, dubbed "The Screwdriver Killer". They try to determine whether the man who was convicted and has just been released from prison was actually the man responsible for the murders.
Episodes.GuestStars: Lisa Darr, Aaron D. Spears, Carol Kiernan, Michael Patterson, Kelly McNair, Mary-Margaret Lewis, Earl Brown, Alan Davidson, Robert Curtis Brown, Paul Vincent O'Connor, Arthur J. Nascarella, Rick Garcia, Pamela Ka

Episodes.Title: Improbable
Episodes.Plot: When Reyes uses numerology to connect the murders of several women to an obsessed serial killer, she and Scully become trapped with a mysterious checker-playing man who may or may not be the killer.
Episodes.GuestStars: Burt Reynolds, Robert Scheid, Amy D'Allessandro, Nick De Marinis, Benito Prezia, Ernesto Gasco, Beth Watson, Larry Udy, Ray McKinnon, John Kapelos, Ellen Greene, Angelo Vacco

Episodes.Title: Scary Monsters
Episodes.Plot: Agent Harrison talks Doggett and Reyes into investigating a boy's claim that monsters killed his mother, who was officially determined to have stabbed herself repeatedly.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jolie Jenkins, Brian Poth, Scott Paulin, Gavin Fink, Steve Ryan, Robert Beckwith

Episodes.Title: Jump the Shark
Episodes.Plot: The agents ask the Lone Gunmen to help find their friendly foe Yves Adele Harlow after former Area 51 Man-In-Black Morris Fletcher claims she is one of the super-soldiers.
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, John Shiban, Frank Spotnitz
Episodes.GuestStars: Michael McKean, Stephen Snedden, Zuleikha Robinson, Jim Fyfe, Marcus Giamatti, Pamela Paulshock, Michael Edward Thomas, Robert Joseph, Thomas Schnauz, John Prosky, Timothy Landfield

Episodes.Title: William
Episodes.Plot: Doggett catches someone in the X-files office trying to steal documents pertaining to Mulder's sister. The intruder is a severely scarred man who blames his disfigurement on Government conspirators. He claims the source of that information - and, in fact, the one who helped him gain entry - is Mulder. Although he refuses to divulge the missing agent's whereabouts, the mystery man has enough knowledge of the X-files and its history to lead Doggett to suspect that he just might be Mulder himself.
Episodes.GuestStars: Annie Abbott, Shannon Hile, Adam Nelson, Jason Waters, Dan Shor, Dallas Munroe, Kiersten Van Horne, Cyd Strittmatter, Chris Owens, David Fabrizio

Episodes.Title: Release
Episodes.Plot: When an FBI cadet with amazing profiling skills approaches Doggett, Reyes, and Scully with a lead on a suspect in a series of recent murders, he claims the same killer is responsible for the death of Doggett's son. The agents find themselves wondering if his knowledge of the deaths is because of his obsession with the cases he has studied at Quantico, or if he is in some way involved in the murders.
Episodes.GuestStars: Barbara Patrick, Jared Poe, Sal Landi, Victoria Gallegos, Avery Glymph, Kate Lombardi, Kipp Shiotani, Mandy Levin, Cary Elwes

Episodes.Title: Sunshine Days
Episodes.Plot: Doggett and Reyes investigate a murder outside the house that the original Brady Bunch series was filmed in. The house is owned by a man named Oliver who is obsessed with the show and has rigged the house into a series of traps and changing appearances to look like the Brady house.
Episodes.GuestStars: Damon Kaylor, Arlene Pileggi, Danielle Savre, Nick Campisano, Marcie Lynn Ross, Robbie Troy, Keith Forster, Sharayah Montgomery, Jack Bensinger, Stephanie M. Herrera, Nolan Irwin, Michael Emerson, John Aylward, Ty

Episodes.Title: The Truth (1)
Episodes.Plot: After not knowing Fox Mulder's whereabouts for the last year, A.D. Skinner and Agent Scully learn he's being held for the murder of a military man he couldn't possibly have killed: Knowle Rohrer, one of the government's secret super-soldiers. With Skinner acting as Mulder's defense, people who Mulder has dealt with during his last nine years as an FBI agent testify on his behalf. But the military tribunal isn't interested in the truth.
Episodes.GuestStars: Adam Baldwin, Matthew Glave, Chris Owens, John Bentley, Alan Dale, Cody Lightning, Christopher J. Stapleton, Patrick St. Esprit, Julia Vera, William Devane, Gary Newton

Episodes.Title: The Truth (2)
Episodes.Plot: When an unexpected person comes to Mulder's rescue, Mulder refuses to slip north over the border to safety. Instead, he heads southwest to the Anasazi ruins of New Mexico seeking a mysterious wise man who the Indians call "The Keeper of the Truth".
Episodes.GuestStars: Laurie Holden, Matthew Glave, Jeff Gulka, Chris Owens, Steven Williams, Adam Baldwin, Alan Dale
